SELECT /* MDMB0010P02.SEARCH00 브랜드조회 */ A.CUST_CODE /* 광고주코드 */ ,B.CUST_NAME /* 광고주명 */ ,A.BRND_CODE /* 브랜드코드 */ ,A.BRND_NAME /* 브랜드명 */ ,C.CATE_CODE ,C.CATE_NAME ,C.DEPT_CODE ,D.DEPT_NAME ,DECODE(A.USEX_YSNO,null,0,A.USEX_YSNO) AS USEX_YSNO /* 사용여부 */ ,CASE WHEN B.BIZR_NUMB = '1188103914' THEN ' ' ELSE TO_CHAR(B.CUST_NAME) END AS SEQX_NAME /* 정렬조건 */ FROM MD_BRNDXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM B ON A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CATEXM C ON A.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE AND A.CATE_CODE = C.CATE_CODE LEFT JOIN TM_DEPTXM D ON TRIM(C.DEPT_CODE) = TRIM(D.DEPT_CODE)
B.CUST_NAME LIKE '%' || #CUST_NAME# || '%' /* 광고주명 */
A.BRND_NAME LIKE '%' || #BRND_NAME# || '%' /* 브랜드명 */
ORDER BY USEX_YSNO DESC,SEQX_NAME,A.BRND_NAME
